channel.title: DigitalSkills
channel.description: Dedicated to proliferating the knowledge and use of Fundamental Digital Skills.

item.title: Digital Skills Info
item.description: Digital transformation for the rest of us. - Digital transformation is a popular buzzword used to describe the practices that corporations and government bodies, around the world, use seeking to remain relevant in the digital age. The leaders in legacy institutions know that you have the power to displace their empires from your livingroom, and are spending billions...

item.title: Flake it till you make it
item.description: Excerpt from Soulshaping by Jeff Brown - Under what circumstances should we step off a path? When is it essential that we finish what we start? If I bought a bag of peanuts and had an allergic reaction, no one would fault me if I threw it out. If I ended a relationship with a woman who...
